title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Ministers of State at the Department of Health) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (ministers state department health) order 2023

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Corona Joyce, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Corona Joyce, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Health, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
Mary Butler, Minister of State at the Department of Health, with effect from 21 
December 2022.
text_norm: 2 corona joyce particular whose address deposited office department health appointed special adviser mary butler minister state department health effect 21 december 2022

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 3. Noel Byrne, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Noel Byrne, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Health, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
Anne Rabbitte, Minister of State at the Department of Health, for the period 
from 21 December 2022 to 28 February 2023. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

4 May, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th May, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [232] 3
text_norm: 3 noel byrne particular whose address deposited office department health appointed special adviser anne rabbitte minister state department health period 21 december 2022 28 february 2023 given official seal government 4 may 2023 leo varadkar taoiseach notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 9th may 2023 232 3

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this Order is to appoint Special Advisers to Ministers of State at 
the Department of Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [232]
